title: Dave Smalley from Don’t Sleep/Dag Nasty/Down By Law/DYS/All
itunes:title: Dave Smalley from Don’t Sleep/Dag Nasty/Down By Law/DYS/All
description:
Episode 299 - Damn, we have a legend on this week in the form of Dave Smalley from Dag Nasty/DYS/Down By Law and most recently, Don’t Sleep. We dive into his musical legacy, the notion of being a professional musician and the highs/lows of touring. It’s a very insightful chat from a person who has experienced all that punk and hardcore can give you. Listen and learn. Let me buy you dinner and get $30 off your first order with Hello Fresh. I love their meals and you will too. Use promo code WORDS30. Get yourself the tools you need with Acer’s new laptop, the Swift 5. Get 10% off by using the code 100WORDS plus free shipping! Change your life with So Delicious Almond Milk w/ Cashew! No joke, best almond milk in the game. Get educated. URM Academy is the best online school for anything production related! You must try it out!Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
